segments.text: Let's program your courses . Since you have had English literature , you should take American literature and American prose and fiction.You transcript indicate that your English background is strong , so I don't think you have any problem with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many credits for each course ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Three , you also should take two three-credit-course in education department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir , I'm sure I will .
segments.speaker: S2
